title: 在创造里怎么能开一个僵尸刷怪笼呢
txt_content: 我手里拿着笼子一放着 就变成别的方块了

replies.author: SmallFatCYW
replies.txt_content:
论坛里面有个很方便的工具啊
[1.4-1.11]「原版指令」MCH v2.8.6.9 —— 麻麻再也不用担心我不会nbt指令了！
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=381131
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)

replies.author: nixgnot
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-210097-1-1.html
如果你是要僵尸/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {EntityId:Zombie}复制代码
1.8+可使用刷怪蛋右键刷怪笼1.11/1.9+可使用give(见2L)

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",SpawnData:{id:"Zombie",},display:{Name:"僵尸"},SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnPotentials:[]}}

这是 1.9/1.10 的 bugjump 不知道干啥 每个版本几乎都不一样
用TMI上面有刷怪笼点一下就有了

replies.author: 奸狱
replies.txt_content:
服务器中可以 give 52 1
然后/spawner Zombie

replies.author: 好奇的小黑
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 

{EntityId:Cow,SpawnCount:每次刷怪笼生成生物的数量,SpawnRange:刷怪范围,RequiredPlayerRange:玩家探测范围,Delay:平均延迟,MinSpawnDelay:最小延迟,MaxSpawnDelay:最大延迟,MaxNearbyEntities:最大刷怪数量}
